CustomField.description: CRM Id for CRM only fields - this value will be displayed only for Salesforce mastered account types - Competitor, Prospect, HQ and RHQ accounts.
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Type)),ISNULL(TEXT(Type))), Is_Competitor__c ), 'COM-' + CRM_Id_Number__c ,
CASE(TEXT(Type), 'Prospect', 'PRO-' + CRM_Id_Number__c , 'HQ', 'HQ-' + CRM_Id_Number__c, 'RHQ', 'RHQ-' + CRM_Id_Number__c, CRM_Id_Number__c) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Id for CRM mastered accounts - Prospect, Competitor, HQ and RHQ accounts.
CustomField.label: CRM Id
